page.title: 13Outdoor Recreation
page.content: In Thornton village there is a good selection of recreation facilities. There is the{Headley Golf Club}on Lower Kipping Lane, close by the viaduct. Further up the hill are the {Bowling Green}and{Tennis Courts}above Wensley Bank West. At Hill Top is {Thornton Cricket Club}on Wilben Lane whose players are in the Bradford League. There are also two{riding {stables,}both on Back Lane. One stable is to keep horses _ they do not have riding lessons. It is used for grazing. The other stable does give riding lessons
